str2: (a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.
This; he, she, it.
Of Hebrew origin; Judas, the name of ten Israelites; also of the posterity of one of them and its region.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A Galilean, an inhabitant of Galilee. From Galilaia; Galilean or belonging to Galilea.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To raise up, set up; I rise from among (the) dead; I arise, appear. From ana and histemi; to stand up.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
An enrollment, census-taking, record. From apographo; an enrollment; by implication, an assessment.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and histemi; to remove, i.e. instigate to revolt; usually to desist, desert, etc.
Apparently a primary word; a people.
Behind, after; back, backwards. From the same as opisthen with enclitic of direction; to the back, i.e. Aback.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
And he, she, it, and that. From kai and ekeinos; likewise that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and the base of olethros; to destroy fully, literally or figuratively.
And, even, also, namely.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: How much, how great, how many, as great as, as much. By reduplication from hos; as As.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From dia and skorpizo; to dissipate, i.e. to rout or separate; specially, to winnow; figuratively, to squander.
